John Stockton

John Houston Stockton

(Stock)

Position: Point Guard ▪ Shoots: Right

6-1, 170lb (185cm, 77kg)

Born: March 26, 1962 in Spokane, Washington us

Relatives: Sons David Stockton, Michael Stockton

College: Gonzaga

High School: Gonzaga Prep in Spokane, Washington

Draft: Utah Jazz, 1st round (16th pick, 16th overall), 1984 NBA Draft

NBA Debut: October 26, 1984

Hall of Fame: Inducted as Player in 2009 (Full List)

Career Length: 19 years

  • Hall of Fame
  • 10x All Star
  • 9x AST Champ
  • 2x STL Champ
  • 11x All-NBA
  • 5x All-Defensive
  • 1992-93 AS MVP

John Stockton was born on March 26, 1962.

John Stockton is 6-1 (185 cm) tall.

John Stockton weighed 170 lbs (77 kg) when playing.

John Stockton was inducted to the Hall of Fame as a Player in 2009 (Full List) .

Point Guard.

When did John Stockton retire?

John Stockton last played in 2003.

John Stockton made at least $67,753,000 playing professional basketball.

John Stockton made $11,000,000 in 2000.

What did John Stockton average?

John Stockton averaged 13.1 points, 2.7 rebounds, and 10.5 assists per game.

John Stockton won 0 championships.
